steps.title: Go to X.
steps.content: Go to X . Find a Tweet to embed on your site.

steps.title: Click on the down arrow icon (v).
steps.content: Click on the down arrow icon ( v ). Select Embed Tweet from the drop-down list.

steps.title: Remove the media From the Tweet (optional), if desired.
steps.content: Remove the media From the Tweet (optional), if desired. Uncheck the Include media checkbox to hide media (photos, GIFs, videos) which displayed alongside the Tweet.

steps.title: Hide the original Tweet from a reply (optional).
steps.content: Hide the original Tweet from a reply (optional). If the selected Tweet is a reply to another Tweet, you can hide the original Tweet by unchecking the "Include parent Tweet" checkbox.

steps.title: Copy the HTML code from the pop-up screen.
steps.content: Copy the HTML code from the pop-up screen. Paste into your blog or website.

steps.title: Done.
steps.content: Done. Now you can see the Tweet on your website!

steps.title: Go to X and select a Tweet.
steps.content: Go to X and select a Tweet. Copy the URL of your Tweet.

steps.title: Go to X/Twitter Publish.
steps.content: Go to X/Twitter Publish. Open publish.twitter.com in your browser.

steps.title: Paste your Tweet URL on the box.

steps.title: Customize your Tweet (optional).
steps.content: Customize your Tweet (optional). Click on the set customization options link if desired. You can change the Tweet link colour, Tweet link colour, and language from there.

steps.title: Copy and paste the HTML code to your website.
steps.content: Copy and paste the HTML code to your website.
